result.eng: I asked the woman for a glass of water.
result.ga: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bhean
result.orig: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bhean
result.html: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an bheanI asked the woman for a glass of water.
result.ponchtml: D'iarr mé gloine uisce ar an ḃeanI asked the woman for a glass of water.

result.html: D'ól sí as gloineShe drank from a glass.
result.ponchtml: D'ól sí as gloineShe drank from a glass.

result.html: Gloine fíona le do thoilGlass of wine, please.
result.ponchtml: Gloine fíona le do ṫoilGlass of wine, please.

result.eng: Give me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.
result.ga: Tabhair gloine sú oráiste dom a Mhama
result.orig: Tabhair gloine sú oráiste dom a Mhama
result.html: Tabhair gloine sú oráiste dom a MhamaGive me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.
result.ponchtml: Taḃair gloine sú oráiste dom a ṀamaGive me a glass of orange juice, Mommy.
